flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
What you will need for this Christmas craft:

• Two colors of felt

• Traditional candy canes or mini candy canes (depends on size of mouse)

• White paper

• Black marker

• Small red button, pom-pom or paper

• Scissors

• Glue

• Ruler
guide.introduction_rendered:
What you will need for this Christmas craft:

• Two colors of felt

• Traditional candy canes or mini candy canes (depends on size of mouse)

• White paper

• Black marker

• Small red button, pom-pom or paper

• Scissors

• Glue

• Ruler
guide.summary: These cute mice are fun to make with kids, you can make them any color you want, and after Christmas is over you can munch on them. Hang them on your tree, put them in the toy box or let them hang around the cookies.
guide.title: Candy Cane Felt Mice
